content:
Dear Editor,

Thank you for considering our manuscript for publication in iScience. We appreciate the time and effort you and the reviewers have taken to evaluate our work.

In response to the reviewer comments, we have carefully considered all of the feedback and have developed a plan to address the concerns raised.

Below, we provide a point-by-point response to the reviewer comments and outline the changes we plan to make to the manuscript:

[Insert specific reviewer comments and your responses to each one here, addressing each concern raised by the reviewers]

We believe that these revisions will significantly improve the clarity and quality of our work, and we are confident that we have addressed all of the concerns raised by the reviewers.

Thank you again for your time and consideration. We look forward to the opportunity to resubmit our revised manuscript.

Sincerely,
[Your Names]
